level.heading: Administrative support.
level.text: The Commission may hire staff and obtain equipment, supplies, materials, and services necessary to carry out the functions of the Commission.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 17-9
level.text: For Law 17-9, see notes following ยง 2-1591.

level.heading: LAW REVIEWS AND JOURNAL COMMENTARIES
level.text: Individual Actor v. Institutional Player: Alternating Visions of the Public Defender. Kim Taylor-Thompson, 84 Geo. L.J. 2419 (1996).
